name: Paper New Year
description:
Paper New Year

A fun endless runner game with a time-bending, new years twist. You must use your time-bending powers to get as far as possible. Beware however, that time affects you more than your enemies. 

This game was built for the Mini-Jam-44, which had a limitation of 3 buttons. (listed below). I will likely be fleshing this out to a full mobile game releasing before the Chinese new year on Jan 25th. 

This game isn't amazing, but should provide a bit of fun. 

Controls

Space Bar = Jump
Left-Click = Slow Time
Right-Click = Reverse Time
